text: This is the university in Ohio. For the university in Florida, see University of Miami. Miami University is a public, coeducational university in Oxford, Ohio. The university has about 20,126 students. It was founded in 1809. The current president of the university is David C. Hodge. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the RedHawks. They have 8 varsity teams for men and 10 for women, most of which play in the Mid-American Conference. The men's ice hockey team plays in the National Collegiate Hockey Conference. ==Other websites== *Miami University's Official website *Miami RedHawks' Official athletics website Category:Mid-American Conference Category:National Collegiate Hockey Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1809 establishments in the United States Category:1800s establishments in Ohio
title: Miami University
